description.en:
This reward type will execute commands when claimed. 
For this reward, it will give the recipient a buff of Speed 2 and Haste 1.
description.ru:
This reward type will execute commands when claimed. 
For this reward, it will give the recipient a buff of Speed 2 and Haste 1.
description.zh:
该奖励类型在领取时会执行指令。
对于该奖励，领取时会给领取者速度2、急迫1的buff。
